Upper Vaal nke mkpo-bere ya bụ; WMA, ma ọ bụ Upper Vael Water Management Area nke akpọrọ na bekee (nke nwere koodu: asatọ), bụ mpaghara nchịkwa mmiri nke gụnyere nnukwu osimiri ndị a: Osimiri Wilge, Osimiri Liebenbergsvlei, Osimiri Mooi na Osimiri Vaal, ma kpuchie Dams ndị a:
Mpaghara ọdọ mmiri  C11 ruo C13, C21 ruo C23, na C81 ruo C83.
